:::Cyclonus/Scourge/Hun-Grr/Godfather/Sharpedge:::

::They hear the order to retreat, transform and start flying back to base::
~~~~~
::Godfather turns to Shockaract::
Godfather: Hey, why don't we join the Decepticons?
~~~~~
::Sharpedge reaches Deemos' position::
Sharpedge: Sorry it took so long Deemos, what did you need me for?

--part1_b0.149c9705.2835966d_boundary
